name: Jon Pumper
profile:
Sometimes musician. Always dork. 

I make piano covers/tutorials and comedy sketches. One of those categories will make you laugh, and the other is my sketches. 

All the equipment I use (piano, etc.) can be found here ► https://www.amazon.com/shop/jonpumper
